name: SatoshiPay
description: SatoshiPay has built a solution for micropayments on the web based on blockchain technology, allowing content providers to monetise digital goods in extremely small increments and without the need for locking up user funds. Founded September 2014 in Berlin, the company has launched a new version in Dec 2017 based on Stellar and is currently working on further upgrades of their service.

jobs.title: Chief Commercial Officer
jobs.description:
SatoshiPay is a fast-growing Berlin and London based technology company founded in 2014. We are right at the center of the constantly evolving fintech industry, reinventing payments, banking, and money. We are looking for an experienced entrepreneur as an addition to our founding team. Our ideal candidate will have a background in high-growth tech businesses, with demonstrable experience launching and driving an international B2B tech business, be excited to build out our stellar team, product, and successfully lead our go-to-market activities.

Responsibilities
- Develop and implement strategic marketing, sales plans and forecasts to shape the commercial path to support growth of our company
- Compile and review competitor products, sales and marketing activities with constant evaluation of the strategic priorities
- Build commercialization infrastructure, including structuring and growing the organization to drive market adoption of the company’s products
- Identify market opportunities and lead the assessment and prioritization of geographic as well as market segments
-Lead development of the B2B marketing strategy in order to increase market penetration and sales growth
- Ensure ongoing and proactive contact with international, national, and local media to maintain a strong global network of known media contacts
- Grow and maintain relationships to venture capitalists and strategic investors
- Represent the company at conferences and networking events
- Build alongside the leadership team a top performing organization, sustain motivation through rapid growth, and lead by example


Requirements
- Proven executive experience in the fintech industry
- Experience and positive track record with executing business partnerships
- Excellent understanding of the digital landscape and payment sector
- Excellent mentoring, coaching and people management skills
- Ability to be hands-on as well as strategic
- A confident and persuasive leader and speaker, adept at confidently delivering compelling presentations to customers, media representatives, and investors
- MBA degree or equivalent, ideally with a focus on Marketing & Sales
- Willingness to travel
- Previous experience in founding /co-founding a company is a plus
- Experience and positive track record raising and negotiating funding is a plus


What we offer
- A disruptive product with high impact on the world
- An inspiring and productive work environment with flat hierarchies and flexible working hours
- A permanent full-time position
- Strong support of a highly skilled, well-connected and experienced international team
- Attractive salary and equity options
- Health care and retirement plans
- An education budget and extra days off to be spent on your self-development
- Modern, hip and well-equipped office in the center of Berlin
- Free office drinks, snacks and fruits
- Subsidized lunches and high-end gym membership

jobs.title: Freelance WordPress Developer (f/m/d)
jobs.description:
### Summary

- Tech stack: PHP, MySQL, WordPress, JavaScript, Docker
- Freelance
- Asap
- Remote work (optionally, in Berlin office)

### Intro

SatoshiPay is a fast-growing technology company founded in 2014. We build a scalable, blockchain-based micropayments platform. Our web widget allows frictionless payments without registration across different websites. One implementation of the web widget is the WordPress plugin: https://wordpress.org/plugins/satoshipay.

### As a freelance WordPress Developer you will…

- develop, improve and maintain the SatoshiPay WordPress plugin.
- manage plugin releases.

### What we are looking for in your track record:

- You have about 5 years of relevant work experience with WordPress or PHP development
- You have experience with building and releasing WordPress plugins.
- You know what it means to work in a fast-growing startup. 


### How to apply

If you have a passion for building innovative and solid WordPress plugins, then we'd love to talk to you! Please apply by sending an email to jobs@satoshipay.io and include:

- Link to LinkedIn, GitHub, Stack Exchange or other relevant websites
- A list of past projects as references – we would like to get to know you better by speaking to your former clients or read some of your code 
- Your expected hourly rate

jobs.title: Senior Full Stack JavaScript Developer
jobs.description:
## TL;DR

* Node, React, Mongo/Postgres, Bitcoin, Docker
* Full-time preferred
* Immediately
* Berlin, Germany

## What you will be doing

* Design and develop highly scalable microservices with Node and Docker
* Deploy and scale microservices in a fully distributed environment
* Securely interact with different blockchains
* Create and operate scalable APIs for clients and front-end developers
* Make design decisions as one of the two key engineers of our team
* Support front-end developers with an easy build and bundling setup

## What we care about

* Agile methodologies
* Fast release cycles
* Responsible and creative work ethic
* “Customer first” attitude
* Strong stance in the open source and blockchain community
* Passion about clean code and test driven development (TDD)

## What we are looking for

You should excel in at least 3 of these:

* Node
* React
* Mongo/Postgres
* Webpack
* Bitcoin/blockchain
* Docker

## Additional skills

* Experience with building and running applications in production
* Enthusiasm for microservices architecture and distributed systems
* Strong analytical and critical thinking skills and a demonstrated ability to find creative solutions to technical problems
* Fluent in English (don’t know German? no problem!)

## It would be nice if you

* Have a remarkable profile in the Free/Libre Open Source community
* Have a deep understanding of ES2016 and new ES proposals
* Consider asynchronous operations and control flow a fun exercise
* Have experience in a testing framework like Mocha or Jasmine

You should not apply if you:

* Primarily use Microsoft products including Windows
* You are a freelancer and not looking for a long-term engagement

## What we offer

Working at a fast-moving startup like SatoshiPay means that all your contributions will have a direct impact on the product and by extension on how people will use the internet in the future. The SatoshiPay team is well-connected, both in the fintech and the cryptocurrency/blockchain scene, so you'll also benefit from being exposed to these communities. We are an open-minded team who work closely together in a non-hierarchical manner at our office in the heart of Berlin.

We are big believers (and users!) of Free/Libre Open Source Software, so you will also be working on software that is released under an open license and take part in open standards activities. We are also regularly attending hackathons and tech conferences.

## Benefits:

* Competitive salary
* Health care and retirement plans
* Fresh fruits and free drinks
* Ergonomic desks and chairs
* Great hardware
* We offer an education budget and extra days off to be spent on your self-development
* Personal branding support: preparing talks and blog posts, participating in industry conferences and hackathons
* Open source contributions

## How to apply

If you have a passion for how web applications should be built, care about making other developers’ lives better, and thrive in a startup environment, then we'd love to talk to you! 

Please include:

* The answer to the question: What is the first argument of a callback?
* A compact CV
* Link to GitHub and Stack Exchange profiles
* A few compelling arguments outlining why you want to work at SatoshiPay and what qualifies you for the challenge
* A list of former employers and past projects as references - we would like to get to know you better by speaking to your former team members


process.exit();
